item.title: Lazy Hardware Provisioning
item.description: Don’t you ever find it annoying setting up your new laptop for the nth time? You always inevitably forget that one package which you need when you’re in the middle of something, and it’s never quite the same as the last install. Not to mention the time wasted - for me at least, it’s normally a whole day set aside. Seeing as I like to automate things, this wasn’t going to cut it.
